response.original_title: Die Tragiese Saak van Pamina Vermaak
response.overview: A journalist, suddenly without work and money. A rock star, licking his wounds after his fianc√© cheated on him. And the beautiful, beautiful West Coast with its unique charm.  The bestseller Die tragiese saak van Pamina Vermaak, by the journalist and writer Annie Klopper, was published in 2018 and is now being made into a movie. Filming of this romcom has started, and the cast includes fresh young talent and various South African legends.
response.title: Die Tragiese Saak van Pamina Vermaak
